mapper.select: select somt.Sales_OutMat_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Qty, somt.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, somt.Sales_OutMat_Price, somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, cut.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, somt.Sales_OutMat_Date from Sales_OutMat_tbl somt inner join Product_Info_tbl pit on somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = pit.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl cut on somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = cut.Cus_Code where somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No = #{Sales_OutMat_Cus_No} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = #{Sales_OutMat_Code} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Date >= curdate() order by somt.Sales_OutMat_No

SELECT A.Sales_OutMat_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Code, sum(A.Sales_OutMat_Qty) Sales_OutMat_Qty, A.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, A.Sales_OutMat_Price, B.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, C.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Date, A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time, A.Sales_OutMat_Modifier FROM Sales_OutMat_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Sales_OutMat_Code = B.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl C on A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = C.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL D on A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = D.CHILD_TBL_NO
where A.Sales_OutMat_Date >= #{startDate} and A.Sales_OutMat_Date < #{endDate}
and A.Sales_OutMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
and A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
group by A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No having Sales_OutMat_Qty>0

SELECT A.Sales_OutMat_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Code, A.Sales_OutMat_Qty sales_OutReturn_Qty, A.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, A.Sales_OutMat_Price, B.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, C.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Date, A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time, A.Sales_OutMat_Modifier FROM Sales_OutMat_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Sales_OutMat_Code = B.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl C on A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = C.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL D on A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = D.CHILD_TBL_NO
where A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time >= #{startDate} and A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time < #{endDate}
and A.Sales_OutMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
and A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
and Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = '213'

select somt.Sales_OutMat_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Date, dt.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Code, somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME Sales_OutMat_Name, pit.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Sales_OutMat_STND_1, dt2.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_UNIT, sum(somt.Sales_OutMat_Qty) Sales_OutMat_Qty, sum(somt.Sales_OutMat_Price) Sales_OutMat_Price from Sales_OutMat_tbl somt inner join DTL_TBL dt on somt.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = dt.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join Product_Info_tbl pit on somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL dt2 on pit.PRODUCT_UNIT = dt2.CHILD_TBL_NO
where somt.Sales_OutMat_Date >= #{startDate} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Date < #{endDate}
and somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
group by somt.Sales_OutMat_Code with rollup
